did.abstract: 25 black-and-white digital photographs representing the Empire Roller Skating Rink.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 25 black-and-white digital prints scanned from 35 mm film representing the Empire Roller Skating Rink.

bioghist.head: Biographical
bioghist.p: Italian-American photographer Patrick D. Pagnano was born in in 1947 in Chicago, IL. He attended Columbia College Chicago before moving New York City with his wife Kari. He was hired as a photojournalist, but spent his free time persuing his own photography work. His book Shot on the Street was published in 2002. His work has been widely exhibited.

userestrict.head: Use
userestrict.p: Copyright to these images is held by Kari D. Pagnano.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
